fields.summary: [dependent on ICC] Set up hosting of two websites
fields.description:
Installation changes:
- IIS (new website, dns, app pool). Disco & SCSC & OFU
- Point to new database, queues and importservice for Nellie.
Nellie and Mike needs to have all queues in msmqlistener.config.

*Prerequsites*
- Database name
- Queues
- Dns
- App pool

Henrik has more information if needed

*Acceptance criteria*
Smoke tests to see that both sites are up and running

The requirements are consolidated in the following document in EPIC
http://epic.hm.com/sites/disco/Documents/OFU2/02%20-%20Solution/09%20-%20Gradual%20roll%20out/Gradual%20Rollout%20Design%20Solution.xlsx

fields.summary: Setup new branch(s) for Mike [Gradual Rollout]
Identify what changes need to be done

- Point to new database, queues and importservice for Nellie.
Nellie msmqlistener.config will contain queues for both Mike and nellie.
